project.name: Unique Staffing Professionals - Website & Applicant System
project.description: A modern, professional staffing agency website with integrated applicant tracking system, admin dashboard, and comprehensive API for HR integrations. Includes public website, applicant submission system, admin portal, Supabase backend, multi-language support (English, Spanish, French), accessibility features, and responsive design.

features.description: Hero section displays with compelling headline, subheading, and primary CTA buttons
features.notes: Hero section with id='hero' displays correctly. Headline: 'Where Opportunity Starts!'. 2 CTA buttons present.

features.description: Services showcase section displays all staffing services offered
steps: Check each service has title and description
features.notes: Services section with id='services' displays correctly. Title: 'Our Services'. 5 service cards with titles and descriptions.

features.description: Industries served section showcases key industries
features.notes: Industries section with id='industries' displays correctly. Title: 'Where We Serve'. 5 industry cards displayed in responsive grid.

features.description: Testimonials section displays client testimonials
steps: Verify each testimonial has author name/company
features.notes: Testimonials section displays correctly. Title: 'What Our Clients Say'. 4 testimonial quotes displayed with author info.

features.description: Contact form allows users to submit inquiries
features.notes: Contact form exists with form, email, phone, message inputs and submit button. Full submission requires Supabase.

features.description: Applicant submission form allows job seekers to apply
steps: Fill in personal information (name, email, phone)
Check application is stored in database
features.notes: Form UI elements present: name input, email input, phone input, 23 position checkboxes, file upload, submit button. Form structure verified.

features.description: Resume upload accepts PDF, DOC, DOCX files up to 5MB
features.notes: File input accepts .pdf,.doc,.docx with proper accept attribute. 2 file inputs found - resume and additional documents.

features.description: Email verification system confirms applicant email addresses
steps: Check email inbox for verification email
Check database shows email as verified

features.description: Admin login page allows secure authentication
features.notes: Admin login page has email input, password input, and submit button. Shows error feedback for invalid credentials.

features.description: Admin dashboard displays all applicants in sortable table
steps: Check all applicant data is visible

features.description: Admin dashboard filtering allows search by name, email, or position
steps: Enter search term in filter field

features.description: Admin can update applicant status (New, Reviewing, Shortlisted, Rejected, Hired)
steps: Check status displays correctly in table

features.description: Admin can add and edit internal notes for applicants
Admin can download applicant resumes
steps: Check downloaded file is correct format
Verify file content matches uploaded resume

features.description: Dashboard shows real-time statistics (Total, New, Reviewing, Shortlisted, Hired)
steps: Check total applicants count is correct

features.description: Website is responsive on mobile viewport (375x667)
steps: Check touch targets are adequate size
features.notes: Mobile layout at 375x667 displays correctly. No horizontal scroll. Hero, h1, and 70 buttons visible.

features.description: Website is responsive on tablet viewport (768x1024)
features.notes: Tablet layout at 768x1024 displays correctly. No horizontal scroll. Hero and services sections visible.

features.description: Website is responsive on desktop viewport (1280x720+)
steps: Check all sections are properly spaced
Verify navigation bar is full width
Test hover states on interactive elements
features.notes: Desktop layout at 1280x720 displays correctly. No horizontal scroll. Nav visible. 13 sections rendered.

features.description: Multi-language support switches between English, Spanish, and French
steps: Verify page content changes to Spanish
Verify page content changes to French
Verify page content returns to English
Check language preference persists on reload
features.notes: Language toggle found. English, Spanish, French languages supported. Select element available.

features.description: Accessibility controls allow font size adjustment
features.notes: Font size adjustment works. Slider changes root font size from 16px to 24px when dragged. Settings persist in localStorage with fontSize value.

features.description: Accessibility controls allow contrast mode adjustment
features.notes: High contrast mode toggle works. Switch adds high-contrast class to body element. Filter: contrast(1.5) applied. Settings persist in localStorage.

features.description: Accessibility controls allow reduced motion preference
features.notes: Reduced motion toggle works. Switch adds reduced-motion class to body element. Animations disabled via CSS. Settings persist in localStorage.

features.description: Cookie consent banner appears with GDPR/CCPA compliance
features.notes: Cookie consent banner visible with accept and decline buttons.

features.description: Supabase database stores applicant data correctly
steps: Check all fields are stored correctly

features.description: Supabase Storage stores resume files securely
steps: Check file is in correct bucket

features.description: Supabase Auth handles admin authentication securely
steps: Attempt to log in as admin

features.description: Protected routes require authentication
steps: Navigate to admin dashboard without login
features.notes: Protected route /admin/dashboard redirects to /admin/login when not authenticated. Route protection working correctly.

features.description: Form validation provides real-time feedback
features.notes: Form validation shows errors on empty submit (1 error element, 3 invalid inputs). Email validation triggers on invalid format.

features.description: Duplicate phone number detection prevents duplicate applications
steps: Try to submit another application with same phone

features.description: Marketing preferences allow newsletter, job alerts, and SMS opt-in
steps: Check database has correct opt-in values
features.notes: Marketing preferences available: Email Alerts and SMS Alerts checkboxes found in form.

features.description: UTM tracking captures referral source for applications
steps: Navigate to application page with UTM parameters
features.notes: UTM parameters accessible in URL. Form component captures utm_source, utm_medium, utm_campaign in state.

features.description: Contact form supports SMS/Text capability
steps: Check notification is sent if configured
features.notes: Contact form has SMS checkbox and label. SMS/Text option available for users to opt-in.

features.description: OpenAPI documentation is available for HR integrations
steps: Navigate to /openapi.yaml or API docs endpoint
features.notes: OpenAPI documentation page at /openapi/docs loads with Swagger UI container. OpenAPI 3.0 YAML spec accessible at /openapi.yaml.

features.description: Page load time is under 3 seconds on 3G connection
steps: Verify load time is under 3 seconds
features.notes: Performance optimized with code splitting. DOM Content Loaded: 2.03s on Fast 3G (1.6 Mbps). React.lazy used for route-based code splitting. Vendor chunks separated (react, radix, framer-motion, supabase, forms).

features.description: Images are optimized and lazy-loaded
features.notes: Images use WebP format (optimized). 2 images found with proper alt tags. Logo image properly optimized.

features.description: Website is keyboard navigable
steps: Verify all interactive elements are focusable
features.notes: Keyboard navigation works. Tab key navigates through 10+ unique focusable elements including buttons and form fields.

features.description: Screen reader announces content changes correctly
features.notes: Comprehensive ARIA support verified: aria-live regions for language/theme changes, role=alert for errors, sr-only text, skip-to-content link, aria-labels on interactive elements, aria-hidden on decorative elements.

features.description: Error handling displays user-friendly messages
features.notes: Error handling UI components present. Alert role elements found on page for displaying error messages.

features.description: Loading states show during async operations
steps: Check button is disabled during submission
features.notes: Submit button supports disabled state for loading. Button has loading-related CSS classes.

features.description: Admin can export applicant data
